content.raw:
I just installed Cartographer… that messed up Protobuf \(changed version\) so I couldn’t build anything anymore.

I was able to restore Protobuf to its initial version \(3.0.0\), and now the main simulation builds, but I can’t build our own program, which was working fine before all this. The error is below. I even got your sample subt\_solution code, and it’s the exact same error:

\[100%\] Linking CXX executable /home/---/subt\_solution/devel/lib/subt\_seed/subt\_seed\_node  
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lZLIB::ZLIB  
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status  
subt\_seed/CMakeFiles/subt\_seed\_node.dir/build.make:126: recipe for target '/home/---/subt\_solution/devel/lib/subt\_seed/subt\_seed\_node' failed  
make\[2\]: \*\*\* \[/home/---/subt\_solution/devel/lib/subt\_seed/subt\_seed\_node\] Error 1  
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:929: recipe for target 'subt\_seed/CMakeFiles/subt\_seed\_node.dir/all' failed  
make\[1\]: \*\*\* \[subt\_seed/CMakeFiles/subt\_seed\_node.dir/all\] Error 2  
Makefile:140: recipe for target 'all' failed  
make: \*\*\* \[all\] Error 2  
Invoking "make install -j24 -l24" failed

Any suggestions?….

‌
content.html:
I just installed Cartographer… that messed up Protobuf (changed version) so I couldn’t build anything anymore.

I was able to restore Protobuf to its initial version (3.0.0), and now the main simulation builds, but I can’t build our own program, which was working fine before all this. The error is below. I even got your sample subt_solution code, and it’s the exact same error:

[100%] Linking CXX executable /home/---/subt_solution/devel/lib/subt_seed/subt_seed_node
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lZLIB::ZLIB
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
subt_seed/CMakeFiles/subt_seed_node.dir/build.make:126: recipe for target '/home/---/subt_solution/devel/lib/subt_seed/subt_seed_node' failed
make[2]: *** [/home/---/subt_solution/devel/lib/subt_seed/subt_seed_node] Error 1
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:929: recipe for target 'subt_seed/CMakeFiles/subt_seed_node.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [subt_seed/CMakeFiles/subt_seed_node.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:140: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
Invoking "make install -j24 -l24" failed

Any suggestions?….

‌
